Title: Relates to conveying land to the town of Montague, Lewis county, in order to allow the expansion of the town's barn for public use
Summary: Relates to conveying approximately 1.2 acres of land located within the forest preserve to the town of Montague, Lewis county, in order to allow the expansion of the town's barn for public use, in exchange for 26 acres of land to be conveyed by such town to the state.
ActClause: Concurrent Resolution of the Senate and Assembly proposing an amendment to section 3 of article 14 of the Constitution, in relation to conveying land to the town of Montague, Lewis county, in order to allow the expansion of the town's barn for public use
